item.title: 5 ways you can personalize your smartwatch with Wear OS
item.media:description: Collage of different watch customization options featuring photos, a Pixel Watch, watch faces and watch face elements
item.description: Make your smartwatch yours with these 5 ways to personalize your smartwatch: watch faces, tiles, complications, apps and more.

og.title: 5 ways you can personalize your smartwatch with Wear OS
og.description: Make your smartwatch yours with these 5 ways to personalize your smartwatch: watch faces, tiles, complications, apps and more.

item.title: Connect on the go and learn new skills with new Android features
item.media:description: Using Reading practice on an Android tablet to build new skills and swiping through new tiles from Spotify for Wear OS to listen to music and podcasts.
item.description: Android is announcing new features to help you get information quickly, have more fun and protect your devices.

og.title: Connect on the go and learn new skills with new Android features
og.description: Android is announcing new features to help you get information quickly, have more fun and protect your devices.

item.title: New ways Android is improving your drive
item.media:description: Illustration of a car interior with two hands holding the steering wheel and the display showing charging station locations on Waze.
item.description: New features are coming to Android Auto and cars with Google built-in to help drivers both on and off the road.

og.title: New ways Android is improving your drive
og.description: New features are coming to Android Auto and cars with Google built-in to help drivers both on and off the road.

item.title: New apps, features and updates coming to Wear OS
item.media:description: An illustrated watch outline sits in the center of a photo of Shoreline Amphitheater, with an illustrated rainbow running through it.
item.description: Look out for new features and apps — like Gmail, Calendar and WhatsApp — plus a new OS update coming to your smartwatch this year.

og.title: New apps, features and updates coming to Wear OS
og.description: Look out for new features and apps — like Gmail, Calendar and WhatsApp — plus a new OS update coming to your smartwatch this year.

item.title: What’s new in the Android ecosystem
item.media:description: Android bot head in the center of a collage of RCS video, WhatsApp on a watch, a generative AI wallpaper, and Android taskbar on a tablet with split screen mode.
item.description: At Google I/O 2023, we shared the latest in the Android ecosystem, alongside new AI-powered features that make your phone uniquely yours.

og.title: What’s new in the Android ecosystem
og.description: At Google I/O 2023, we shared the latest in the Android ecosystem, alongside new AI-powered features that make your phone uniquely yours.

item.title: Express yourself on Android, with help from AI
item.media:description: A series of decorated Android bot heads with corresponding clocks and widgets in the same colorways as the bots.
item.description: At I/O 2023, Android announced new customization features using generative AI that help make your devices uniquely yours.

og.title: Express yourself on Android, with help from AI
og.description: At I/O 2023, Android announced new customization features using generative AI that help make your devices uniquely yours.

item.title: Bigger and better apps on Android tablets and foldable phones
item.media:description: A collection of Android devices with large screens show the Calm app on a foldable phone, Google Calendar on a tablet, and the Peloton app on a foldable phone.
item.description: Your favorite apps have been redesigned so they look great and are easy to use on Android's large screens.

og.title: Bigger and better apps on Android tablets and foldable phones
og.description: Your favorite apps have been redesigned so they look great and are easy to use on Android's large screens.

author.name: Diana Wong
author.title: Group Product Manager, Android Large Screens Developer

item.title: How Android keeps you and your devices safe
item.media:description: Android bot head in the center of a collage of icons indicating security, headphones and keys as well as a notification saying “tracker traveling with you”.

og.title: How Android keeps you and your devices safe
og.description: At I/O 2023, Google shares the latest ways Android keeps you and your devices safe.

item.title: Discover more than 800 free TV channels with Google TV

item.title: Share files easily between Android devices and Windows PCs
item.media:description: A still Illustration of an Android phone receiving a photo sent from a nearby Windows computer using Nearby Share Beta.

og.description: We are introducing Nearby Share Beta for Windows, an app that helps you share files between Android devices and Windows PCs.

item.title: New tools to help developers build better health apps
item.media:description: Empowering healthcare workers in Kenya with technology

item.title: Spring into action with these 9 new features for Android and Wear OS
